introduction.interes: with interest in acquiring work experience and continue learning to contribute value to digital projects.

hkanime.title: HKanime
hkanime.description: HKanime is a streaming application of anime where you can watch your favorite animes and talk with other users.

uwallet.title: Uwallet
uwallet.description: Uwallet is an application to manage your personal finances, centralizing credit and debit cards. As well as make transfers, withdrawals and payments.

valorant.title: Valorant
valorant.description: Application where the agents of Valorant are shown and their abilities. Created for educational purposes.

animaciones.title: Animations with CSS and Tailwind
animaciones.description: Application where different animations are shown with code in CSS and Tailwind. The code is shown in a simple editor, ready to copy.

about.title: About Me
about.text1: I'm Kiara, a frontend developer with experience in creating dynamic, optimized, and accessible interfaces. I am currently studying the
about.text7: I specialize in web development, ensuring that applications are efficient and easy to use. I have worked on projects using agile methodologies and always seek to improve my skills and take on new challenges.
about.text8: I am also interested in UX/UI design and frontend performance optimization. In my free time, I enjoy video games and exploring new technologies.
